custom.name: Custom Learning Experiences
custom.caption: We develop eLearning experiences starting from scratch or jump in with what you already have
custom.blurb: Whether you need custom eLearning courses crafted specifically for your organization, microlearning delivered in the flow of work, or a blended solution, we've got you covered.

meta.title: Custom Employee Training Development, From Design To Launch
meta.desc: Developing your own employee training courses in-house can be daunting. At EdgePoint, we work with you to create engaging custom learning experiences. Learn more.

codev.name: Co-Development
codev.caption: We expand your team’s capabilities and capacity
codev.blurb: We jump in wherever you need us. Instructional design? Voiceover? Custom graphics? Engaging activities? We enable you to quickly expand your team’s capabilities and capacity.

meta.title: Co-Development: Get Help With Your Employee Training
meta.desc: Whether you need an employee training project done fast, or want to bring in the latest learning technologies, EdgePoint Learning can help.

hero.headline: Co-Development
hero.tagline: We're your partner in employee training

strategy.name: Training Strategy
strategy.caption: We design effective training programs for your employees
strategy.blurb: Employee training programs should be engaging and effective, with well-defined goals. We can help you design the ideal training strategy, from training needs analysis through launch.

meta.title: Employee Training Consulting and Program Planning
meta.desc: Employee training should be fun, not a dreaded checkmark at the end of the day. At EdgePoint, we're here to help you create killer user experiences for your team.

hero.headline: Training Strategy
hero.tagline: We're your guide to better learning

bootcamp.name: eLearning Boot Camp
bootcamp.caption: We teach you how to build effective, engaging eLearning
bootcamp.blurb: Looking to build your own eLearning or take your skills to the next level? Our experts can provide the training, templates, and best practices you need.

meta.title: Unlock eLearning Excellence
meta.desc: Boost eLearning expertise with EdgePoint Learning. Our team empowers yours to create captivating online training. Elevate your organization's eLearning capabilities. Explore now!
